title: @riot -Banned til today, Never told why (no email), sent support ticket (no answer) - STILL BANNED ?
body:
I got banned for 2 weeks, 2 weeks ago. Never even had a chat restriction before. My ban is supposed to be over today, but i'm still banned.

RIOT - 

1) Please tell me why I was banned in the first place. I just want to know specifically so I can insure I fix the problem. I don't want to be a bother to anyone and I don't want to lose my account permanently. (i sent in a support ticket - no help)

2) Did you extend my ban? 

3) Is this a practice you accept and encourage there (banning people, not telling them, lieing about the duration of the ban)? I'm not trying to be accusatory, just trying to get an honest answer.

I don't understand what is going on here. I'm really stupid maybe.

replies.body:
What time did it give you on your ban? Remember they are on West Coast (Pacific) time, so if you're ahead your time will be different when you're unbanned. It's best to wait at most 24 hours after the specific time stamp of your ban has passed.  

They cannot extend the ban without notifying you (unless you did something worse like install illegal 3rd party software or other ban worthy actions. Though that results in permanent ban). 

For why you were banned; unfortunately only Riot can notify you why you received a suspension on your account. I can try to decipher what might of happened, but unfortunately without the email you won't know exactly. Riot Support is the best way to get more information, just be sure you submitted it under the right tab/question. 

I would recommend checking your Spam/Junk folder in your email to be sure it didn't get accidentally moved. Also be sure the account that was suspended is linked to your main email. If you use a different email then be sure to check that. Riot sends out emails to the address connected to your account. 

I hope that helps :)

there is no time indicator on the ban notification

i submitted a ticket loooong ago. all they did was say they would get back to me, same automated thing everyone gets.

I check my inbox and spam/junk mail folders everyday, on the associated email account as well as 2 other email accounts that i have (just in case) - no email ever

The funny thing is, 

:D they DID sent me a survey about my recent customer service experience

 lol

You ban ends at 13:51:19 PDT today.

The punishment was issued for behavior related reasons after a manual review of your account. An email as sent, so I'm not sure what happened there.

This is all the information I have. You'll have to speak with player support to get more details.

thank you for letting me know what time my ban ends

behaviour related issues - is there any way someone could message me or email with an elaboration of what this means. as I said I am very stupid. When you say that, I think "they want me to stop behaving?"

What was it. I know there was a NORMAL game where I played with a premade 4 who were extremely toxic,  hate speech like crazy. I decided to not help them win the game (no feeding, just jg afk basically, still killed enemies if i was attacked).

Are you saying I must alter my behaviour to include assisting racist homophobic sociopaths to achieve their goals in your game, at all costs. Because I guess you can perma ban me then, because I cant do that. You want me to encourage their rampage through your game? Your response to this situation makes me think so.

But you've just left me to guess. I DID NOT get an EMAIL. As i say i checked several times a day EVERY day for the last 2 weeks.

I DID submit a support ticket. No one will respond to it. 

But I do really believe that this is the best you can do as you say. That is the worst part.

> What was it. I know there was a NORMAL game where I played with a premade 4 who were extremely toxic, hate speech like crazy. I decided to not help them win the game (no feeding, just jg afk basically, still killed enemies if i was attacked).
Are you saying I must alter my behaviour to include assisting racist homophobic sociopaths to achieve their goals in your game, at all costs. Because I guess you can perma ban me then, because I cant do that. You want me to encourage their rampage through your game? Your response to this situation makes me think so.

I looked into your case further for you. You were constantly picking roles then playing other roles, afking, giving up, and generally trolling you teams. It wasn't a single game, it was many games.

Yes, I am saying it is not acceptable to do these things.

> I DID submit a support ticket. No one will respond to it.

You had another ticket open on your other account, and the agent accidentally merged the cases together which meant you didn't get a response on one. That should not have happened.

It's like talking to the government with you guys.

Your reply is a gross thoughtless generalization. You are completely missing the point. It's like from the first person I talked to I only ever received automated replies.

If you really feel that how this case went, is how it should, then you have a wildly differing idea of what a healthy community is, what healthy behaviour is, from what a real person would consider acceptable.

Sometimes it seems like you guys are actulal people. Then you get ridiculous automated responces like this. You will never convince me that I should be so careful not to ruin the fun of groups of people who are being racist and terrible to each other.

Give your head a shake. Really. People in your own real life are probably wondering what is wrong with you if this is how you really think. 

I can promise you will never hear from me again. (except to resolve my SONS banned account, the one who we both know who stole it, 3 months you've kept his account from him now)

I really feel bad for you as a company, a community, and a person.

> Sometimes it seems like you guys are actulal people. Then you get ridiculous automated responces like this. You will never convince me that I should be so careful not to ruin the fun of groups of people who are being racist and terrible to each other.

This is far form an automated response.

Each person is responsible for their own behavior. No, if someone is offensive or trolling it does not give you permission to do the same. Mute them, and report them at the end of the game.

I'm not really sure why you're being so aggressive with me for helping shed some light on your issue and get someone to look into it.

Someone else acting up doesn't give you a free pass to start acting up as well. By retaliating you are ruining the game for the rest of your teammates. If someone refuses to stop acting up then just mute, report and move on. From the [Instant Feedback System FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286): 

>**WHY WAS I PUNISHED WHEN THE OTHER PERSON WAS WORSE OR STARTED IT!**
* Simply speaking, retaliation is not an acceptable or justifiable behavior. An argument between two players can easily create a negative experience for the rest of the players in the game with you. Regardless of the other player’s actions, this does not justify your own behavior. You alone are responsible for your actions within the game. If you encounter a toxic player like this, the best option is to simply report their behavior and move on.
* Reports are a vital piece to the puzzle. If you are not sure of what sort of behavior is reportable take a look at the [Reporting a Player FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player)

 From [Understanding the Tribunal](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2726400): 

>**4) That player in my game was far worse than me. Why am I banned???**
a) I'll keep this one simple: retaliation isn't OK. Reacting to a toxic player by being toxic just incites that player to be even worse--it also ruins the game for up to 8 other players. It is far, far worse to watch two people yelling at each other all game than it is to watch 1 player ranting into blank space. Almost everyone in the game can find someone out there that behaves worse than they do--but so what? Finding someone worse doesn't justify your behavior or justify retaliation. We expect more out of our players. What players often don't realize is... those other players in your game that you thought were worse? Nearly 100% of the time, those players were banned even before you were. If someone is being toxic, just report them and move on. If you retaliate, both of you will be banned. It's really that simple.

Tantram didn't give you an automated response here. You asked them to look into your case for you and they did. Not only that but Tantram even admitted that there was a mistake done on Supports end that should not have happened. Just because it wasn't the response you wanted to hear doesn't make it automated.

That is weird. There is always a time of when your suspension ends. Did it give you a date? I'm assuming it did in the client when you try to log in. 

I would try submitting another one just in case. The automated is normal, but you should hear from a specialist sometime after the automated one. A bit strange but it doesn't hurt to try again. 

As for the survey: They send it to accounts randomly. I used to get surveys all the time, and lately I haven't received any. So it was more of a coincidence than intended haha.

Op just relax. The red helped you like you asked, no need to be rude to him.

Thank him, stop being toxic on both boards and game, and move along.
Ask for proof if you think you are innocent.
